subtitle: Henry Ross Halpin, fur trader and Indian agent
title: Adventures in the West
subjects: Indians of North America -- Prairie Provinces -- History -- 19th century
by_statement: [edited by] David R. Elliott ; foreword by Richard J. Preston.

notes.value:
"An edited version of Halpin's longer handwritten manuscript that he prepared before  1928 ... accompanied by a shorter sixteen-page typewritten account of his capture by the rebel Cree in 1885 from an earlier document"--P. 17

Includes bibliographical references (p. 221-225) and index.
